title.bibl: El Nacional, Mar. 19, 1932. New Base Ball Players

div.bibl: El Nacional, Mar. 19, 1932. NEW BASE BALL PLAYERS

body.p: We have been informed that four new players have been added to the base ball unit of the Excelsior Sport Club. The young men who have come to the club and who make up a part of the new base ball nine, are as follows:
Manuel Lira and Felipe Gomez of Kansas City, fielder and first baseman respectively; Retugio Campos and Jimmy Cowltress, of San Antonio, thire base.
The Excelsior has been provided with good players from the base ball sport field.
